text: Are kakaj kekaꞌyex kumal ri winaq, rumal cher kakikoj ri nimaꞌq taq filacterias xuqujeꞌ kakiwiqiqej ri katzꞌyaq.23:5 Kꞌo alaj taq nitzꞌ kaxa bꞌantal che tzꞌuꞌm ubꞌiꞌnam filacteria. Pa taq riꞌ ri alaj taq kaxa riꞌ kꞌo jujun paj tzij rech ri utaqanik ri Moisés. We alaj taq kaxa riꞌ kajatꞌix chikipalaj ri fariseos o che ri kimox qꞌabꞌ jeriꞌ kakikꞌutu chi tajin kakichomaj rij ri utzij ri Dios xuqujeꞌ kakixim alaj taq chixchiꞌy che ri atzꞌyaq ri kajatꞌin ri kijolom kaqaj loq chikipalaj rech jeriꞌ kakikꞌutu chi qas e tyoxalaj taq winaq.
